mapper.select: select e.employeeNumber as empNo, e.name as name, (select DTL_C_NM from CMCDDTLM c1 where c1.GRP_C='position' and c1.DTL_C=position) as position, e.division as dcode, e.position as pcode, e.basic_dept, (select dept_nm from dept where dept_no=e.basic_dept) basic_dept_nm, (select DTL_C_NM from CMCDDTLM c2 where c2.GRP_C='organization' and c2.DTL_C in(select org_no from dept where dept_no=e.basic_dept)) as basic_dept_org_nm, e.first_dept, ifnull((select dept_nm from dept where dept_no=e.first_dept),"") first_dept_nm, ifnull((select DTL_C_NM from CMCDDTLM c3 where c3.GRP_C='organization' and c3.DTL_C in(select org_no from dept where dept_no=e.first_dept)),"") as first_dept_org_nm, e.second_dept, e.three_dept, e.four_dept, e.gender, e.country, e.joinDate, e.status, e.manager, (select auth from manager m where m.empNo=e.employeeNumber) as auth, e.email, e.office, e.seat, e.profile_name, e.office_number from employee e where e.employeeNumber=#{empNo}

select count(*) from employee
${keyword} like concat('%',#{search},'%')
and (first_dept=#{search} or second_dept=#{search} or three_dept=#{search} or four_dept=#{search})
${keyword}=#{search}
mapper.update: update employee set manager='n' where employeeNumber=#{empNo}
mapper.select: select manager from employee where employeeNumber=#{empNo}

SELECT division as dCode,count(*) count,office, (SELECT CONCAT(dept_nm,' ', DTL_C_NM) AS dept_nm FROM dept d, CMCDDTLM c where c.GRP_C='organization' and c.DTL_C = d.org_no and dept_mgr_no=2 and d.dept_no =e.division) division, (SELECT DTL_C_NM from CMCDDTLM c where c.GRP_c='color' and c.DTL_C = (SELECT color from dept where dept_no=e.division)) color FROM employee e where seat like '%n%' and country = 'kr' group by division order by office desc ;
mapper.update: update employee set profile_name=#{profile_name} where employeeNumber=#{empNo}
mapper.select: select name,employeeNumber as empNo from employee where position > 1 and employeeNumber not in(select emp_no from dept where emp_no is not null) and country=#{country}

select name, (select DTL_C_NM from CMCDDTLM c1 where c1.GRP_C='position' and c1.DTL_C=position) as pos_nm, basic_dept, employeeNumber empNo from employee where employeeNumber not in(select emp_no from dept where emp_no is not null and country=#{country}) and country=#{country} order by position desc,joinDate asc

select e.division,count(*) count,(select dept_nm from dept where emp_no=e.employeeNumber) div_nm from employee e where e.employeeNumber="G00001" group by div_nm union (SELECT e.division,count(*) count, (SELECT CONCAT(dept_nm,' ', DTL_C_NM) AS dept_nm FROM dept d, CMCDDTLM c where c.GRP_C='organization' and c.DTL_C = d.org_no and dept_mgr_no in(select d1.dept_no from dept d1 where dept_nm=#{country} and org_no=1) and d.dept_no =e.division) div_nm FROM employee e where country = #{country} group by div_nm)
mapper.update: update employee set country=#{country} where division=#{dept_no}

update employee set first_dept=#{first_dept},second_dept=#{second_dept},three_dept=#{division},four_dept=0,division=#{first_dept} where four_dept=#{division} || three_dept=#{division} || second_dept=#{division}

update employee set first_dept=#{first_dept},second_dept=#{second_dept},three_dept=#{three_dept},four_dept=#{division},division=#{first_dept} where four_dept=#{division} || three_dept=#{division} || second_dept=#{division}
